title: Can't post in the boards
body:
Hi Guys!
I can't post in  the boards. I'm already reach the level in game to post, but when I'm about to post something, it says that I need lv 7 to post. What should I do to fix this?

replies.body: Sometimes the boards just need a little push before it can sync up with your Summoner level. Once you posted here, it forced those levels to sync and you're showing up as level 7 for me now!
